Name: RD Mars
About the game: RD Mars is a top-down shooter where you play as an AI reconstruction of a once-great inventor, Felix Darwins. Explore the laboratory, and learn of his rise and downfall. RD Mars has a series of mechanical innovations making the genre like you've never seen before. RD Mars is a game that challenges traditional conceptions of what video games are creatively through an uncompromising artistic vision and subversion of traditional narrative. Features: A strong, character-driven story that explores the human condition. A unique parry-based combat loop with a focus on the fluidity of play. Mystery and intrigue that drives players to uncover the secrets of this world. RD Mars analyzes the pitfalls of this inventorâ€™s mind while you explore both the lab, but also Mars himself. Content warning for epilepsy, motion sickness, or those sensitive to issues relating to mental health. /
